thread.title: Campus dashboards measure building energy use in Sparkys (University of Illinois at Chicago)
thread.title_full: Campus dashboards measure building energy use in Sparkys (University of Illinois at Chicago) - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: Campus dashboards measure building energy use in Sparkys (University of Illinois at Chicago)
text: ( Source : University of Illinois at Chicago ) Nine campus buildings have dashboards that show the building's energy use, measured by UIC mascot Sparky D. Dragon . Project organizers believe showing people real-time energy use makes them more
